snippet.title: Kill to Collect - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Kill to Collect will be available on Steam on April 6, 2016  http://store.steampowered.com/app/241760/

So start preparing to earn your keep and die trying, as you travel further down this sleepless cesspool of murderous vagrants and cybernetic freaks, slicing and dicing your way to the bottom of your career.

In Kill to Collect, players will take up the role of the “Hunters”, hired contract killers that will carry out any task for the right price. 

Navigating Geoshelter Alpha, Hunters must keep their wits about them to endure the harsh, lawless slums of the Deeper Levels, overrun by corrupt mega corps and criminal degenerates. With four unique Hunters to choose from, players can take down their bounties with swift swords, iron fists, riot guns, or even electrocution. The three different game modes and variety of weapons to discover also help keep each run fresh and exciting.

Follow us!
https://www.facebook.com/piecesinteractive
https://twitter.com/PiecesInt

”Courtesy of NewRetroWave
https://newretrowave.bandcamp.com/
https://twitter.com/NewRetroWave
https://www.facebook.com/NewRetroWaveOfficial
https://www.facebook.com/NRW.Records.Official/
Get the full song here and more: http://bit.ly/1HjhjRR”
